name: JP (@byjp@hachyderm.io)
summary:
Attached: 2 images

やった！I did it! I’ve walked a million metres in 2023 (since the start of my sabbatical) — that’s the full height of Great Britain; over 1.4 million steps.

My final strides here in Ginza, Tokyo, on some kind of celebration day that has kept the streets totally devoid of cars (which was awesome and made it feel weirdly like a village)
